prompt:
Patient: Hold on.

Nurse: Hi, this is Rachel calling from O'Connor Hospital. I'm an AI on a recorded line. Is this Carla Arnold?

Patient: Yes.

responses.gpt4: Hello, Patient Carla Arnold. I'm calling on behalf of Dr. Jack Smith to have a brief check-in about your chronic kidney disease and lupus. I hope you're doing well. Can you please tell me how you've been feeling recently?
responses.our_model: Great. I'm calling on behalf of your primary care doctor, Doctor Jack Smith, to check in on you. How have you been doing lately?
